title: The influence of the doping concentration and reverse intersystem crossing on the efficiency of tricomponent organic light-emitting diodes with the thermally activated delayed fluorescence exciplex emitter
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19505-19511
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02394C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhenyong Guo, Zhiqi Kou, Xiangqiong Xie, Yanbo Wang, Xinyu Zhu, Qixuan Jin, Chenchen Wang
We fabricate a series of fluorescent organic light-emitting diode (OLED) with the thermally activated delayed fluorescence (TADF) exciplex emitter in order to improve efficiency through the reverse intersystem crossing (RISC) process.
